item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2015/11/s2000-antenna/#comment-114572">Steven Carones</a>.
Thank you sir, HalfSpec did a great job with this and very thoroughly documented the install in his guide. You can find his thread on this in the Parts for Sale section on NoRotors. I can't believe it took this long for someone to make a kit like this for the FD!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Steven Carones.

Thank you sir, HalfSpec did a great job with this and very thoroughly documented the install in his guide. You can find his thread on this in the Parts for Sale section on NoRotors. I can’t believe it took this long for someone to make a kit like this for the FD!

item.title: By: Steven Carones
item.dc:creator: Steven Carones
item.description: I've been planning on doing this for the longest time now! Thank you for the directions and thanks to HalfSpec for the adapter! Excellent work and attention to the smallest details! Yours is by far the cleanest FD I've ever seen.
item.content:encoded: I’ve been planning on doing this for the longest time now! Thank you for the directions and thanks to HalfSpec for the adapter! Excellent work and attention to the smallest details! Yours is by far the cleanest FD I’ve ever seen.
